m_szDocTitle: No Mini Van for this Mega Mom (Video) | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: No Mini Van for this Mega Mom (Video) September 21st, 2012 by Chelsea     Move over,  Sarah Palin — Emily Finch is a real mama grizzly. Finch has forsaken her mini van and SUV for a life lived on a bicycle . Finch runs all her errands, including hauling groceries, by bicycle. Sounds reasonable enough, no? One small detail: She has six kids. That’s right, Finch is a mother of six and has abandoned a car-centric life for pedal power. I imagine you’re a bit more impressed with this lifestyle choice now.
